fig.name: Captain America
fig.special_1: +5 I'M WITH CAP: When targeted by a ranged combat attack, Captain America can use Shape Change
fig.special_2: INSPIRING LEADER: Captain America can use Leadership. When he does and succeeds choose a friendly character and modify the attack and defense values of that character by +1 until your next turn.

fig.name: Captain America
fig.special_1: +5 I'M WITH CAP: When targeted by a ranged combat attack, Captain America can use Shape Change
fig.special_2: INSPIRING LEADER: Captain America can use Leadership. When he does and succeeds choose a friendly character and modify the attack and defense values of that character by +1 until your next turn.

fig.name: Iron Man
fig.special_1: +5 IRON MAN IS RIGHT: Iron Man can use Plasticitly
fig.special_2: DRIVEN LEADER: Iron Man can use Leadership when he does and succeeds, choose an opposing character and modify the attack and defense values of that character by -1 until your next turn.

fig.name: Iron Man
fig.special_1: +5 IRON MAN IS RIGHT: Iron Man can use Plasticity
fig.special_2: DRIVEN LEADER: Iron Man can use Leadership when he does and succeeds, choose an opposing character and modify the attack and defense values of that character by -1 until your next turn.

fig.name: Black Widow
fig.special_1: I KNOW MY MISSON: Ignores Characters for Movement
fig.special_2: +5 IRON MAN IS RIGHT: Black Widow can use Plasticity
fig.special_3: DEADLY INFILTRATOR: Black Widow can use Exploit Weakness and Shape Change.

fig.name: War Machine
fig.special_1: +5 IRON MAN IS RIGHT: War Machine can use Plasticity

fig.name: Ant-Man
fig.special_1: +5 I'M WITH CAP: When targeted by a ranged combat attack, Ant-Man can use Shape Change
fig.special_2: SNEAKING IN: Give Ant-Man a free action and choose a standard adjacent friendly character. That character can use Tiny Damage Symbol this turn.
fig.special_3: PYM PARTICLE DISCS: When Ant-Man hits an opposing character, the hit character gains your choice of Tiny Damage Symbol or Giant Damage Symbol this turn

fig.name: Hawkeye
fig.special_1: +5 I'M WITH CAP: When targeted by a ranged combat attack, Hawkeye can use Shape Change
fig.special_2: LOCK ON TARGET: When Hawkeye hits an opposing character with a ranged combat attack, modifiy the defense value of the hit target by -1 this turn.
fig.special_3: RIDING ON AN ARROW: When Hawkeye hits an opposing character with a ranged combat attack, after actions resolve you may place an adjacent frinedly character with the Avengers keyword and Tiny Damage Symbol adjacent to a hit target.

fig.name: Redwing
fig.special_1: AERIAL RECON: Give Redwing a free action and choose an opposing character within 4 squares and line of fire. Modify the chosen character's defense by -1 until your next turn. (UNIQUE MODIFIER-Caracters can only be modified by one effect of this name.)

fig.name: Falcon
fig.special_1: +5 I'M WITH CAP: When targeted by a ranged combat attack, Falcon can use Shape Change
fig.special_2: ENHANCED GOGGLES: Falcon can use probability Control, but only to reroll his own attacks. When Falcon attacks a character wuth Tiny Damage Symbol, modify that character's defense value by -1

fig.name: Winter Soldier
fig.special_1: NO DISTRACTIONS: Improved Targeting: Ingnores Hindering; May make a ranged combat attack against any opposing character within range and line of fire, even if that character is in an adjacent square.
fig.special_2: +5 I'M WITH CAP: When targeted by a ranged combat attack, Winter Soldier can use Shape Change

fig.name: Giant-Man
fig.special_1: +5 I'M WITH CAP: When targeted by a ranged combat attack, Giant-Man can use Shape Change
fig.special_2: SWAT!: Give Giant-Man a power action to make a close combat attack targeting all opposing characters within 2 squares and line of fire. Instead of normal damage, adjacent hit targets are dealt 3 damage and non-adjacent hit targets are delt 2 damage.

fig.name: Agent 13
fig.special_1: BASIC TRAINING: Improved Movement: Ignores Hindering Terrain
fig.special_2: YOU WON'T KNOW WHO TO TRUST: Agent 13 can use Outwit. She may use it to counter team abilities

fig.name: Crossbones
fig.special_1: TRAINING: UNIQUE MODIFIER - Adjacent opposing characters modify their attack and defense by -1
fig.special_2: SOW INSURRECTION: Crossbones can use perplex. When he does, after actions resolve you may counter a team ability the target opposing character can use until your next turn.

fig.name: Black Panther
fig.special_1: +5 IRON MAN IS RIGHT: Black Panther can use Plasticity
fig.special_2: WAKANDAN TECH: Black Panther can use Precision Strike.
fig.special_3: HE'S AROUND HERE SOMEWHERE: Black Panther can use Sidestep. Opposing characters 4 or more squares from him can't draw a line of fire to him.

fig.name: Vision
fig.special_1: +5 IRON MAN IS RIGHT: Vision can use Plasticity
